California's state treasurer, Bill Lockyer , today denounced ongoing efforts to establish a new framework for states to restructure their debts, saying no state wanted or needed to declare bankruptcy. It's a cynical proposal, intended to incite a panic in response to a phony crisis, Mr. Bill Lockyer said in a conference call with journalists.`` Killer bees, space aliens, and now it's the invasion of the bankrupt states.'' American Idol's season-one co-host Brian Dunkleman admits to having been extremely freaked out the first time he saw Simon Cowell tell someone they should never sing again. It's one thing to watch it on television, but then you spend time with these kids and you have to look at them right in the eyes, and then their mother is looking at you, like,` What just happened?'?
